name: DCKAP TECHNOLOGIES
overview:
DCKAP is a leading global technology services company delivering technology-driven business solutions that meet the strategic objectives of our clients.

We differentiate ourselves in the IT market place by providing unmatched business value to customers through a combination of business analysis process excellence, quality frameworks and service delivery innovation.

As a company with global impact, our mission is, “We Do IT Rightâ€. We believe in being powered by intellect, speed, innovation and excellence-in-execution. We provide the best solutions for our clients to maximize return on their IT investments.

DCKAP is headquartered in Fremont, CA and state of the art offshore operations in Chennai, India. DCKAP has recognized that its success depends on changing the world and also upon making an important contribution to the success of its customers. We offer 24X7 Customer and Technical Support to our Customers in accordance to their business demands and needs. We have a proven track record in delivering a broad range of technology solutions with world class service.

What We Do

DCKAP designs, develops and delivers technology-enabled business solutions that help Fortune 500 and Small to Medium Size Enterprises win in a Global Market. We specialize in increasing the ability of individuals and organizations to be more effective and productive with their IT infrastructure. We provide a complete range of Information Technology services by leveraging our domain and business expertise and strategic alliances with leading technology providers.

Our service offerings span open source implementations, web 2.0, software testing, technology consulting, application services, systems integration, custom software development, maintenance, business process re-engineering, electronic publishing, game programming, IT infrastructure services, business process outsourcing and more.

Our clients gain competitive advantage by leveraging our unique delivery capability to achieve rapid deployment, world class quality and reduced costs. Through our expertise in IT we harness our strong domain and technology competence to identify business problems and deliver the right solutions to our customers. Standing strong in our commitment to excellence, we help you overcome complex technical challenges. Our development and business process outsourcing centers span the globe, ensuring all projects are completed on time and in a cost effective manner. DCKAP provides on-site, off-site and offshore solutions and we are committed to meet your business needs with 24/7 exceptional customer centric service and innovative solutions.
